subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|ls=i|厶|廾}}: hands (廾) placing a hat (厶) on someone’s head.

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
; “cap; to wear a cap; low-ranking military officer; to place before or above”
: Possibly related to {{och-l|冕|crown}} ({{zh-ref|Wang, 1982}}).
